projects.name: Team Management
projects.description: Developed Team Management web application using ReactJs that allows users to manage teams by conveniently moving team members from one team to another. Utilized React Hooks and local storage to create an intuitive and responsive user interface.

projects.name: N-Queen Visualizer
projects.description: Developed a web page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create visualizations of N-Queen problem. Recursion and backtracking approach is used to solve the problem of N-Queen in which we have to place N Queen on an N x N chessboard such that no two queens attack each other. Employed HTML for layout, CSS for styling, and JavaScript for real-time user input processing and visualization generation.

projects.name: Page Replacement Algorithms
projects.description: Created a simple web app that allows the user to understand different page replacement algorithms like FIFO, LRU, and Optimal Page replacement. It aims to minimize the number of page faults.
